Sentencas: Lanthanum ferrites present electrical and magnetic properties that enable their use in several areas.
Titulo: Perovskites used as cathode in solid oxide fuel cells synthesized by solution combustion synthesis (SCS)

Sentencas: Specifically, lanthanum ferrites doped with cobalt and strontium have electrical conductivity and thermal stability, which enable their use as electrodes (cathode) in solid oxide fuel cells and as catalysts in oxygen separation membranes.
Titulo: Perovskites used as cathode in solid oxide fuel cells synthesized by solution combustion synthesis (SCS)

Sentencas: This study aimed to investigate the effect of the fuel concentration and calcination temperature over the synthesis of La0,6Sr0,4Co0,8Fe0,2O3 nanopowders through solution combustion synthesis (SCS) using sucrose (C12H22O11) as fuel.
Titulo: Perovskites used as cathode in solid oxide fuel cells synthesized by solution combustion synthesis (SCS)

Sentencas: Therefore, the powder was obtained using oxidant and reductant reagents in a stoichiometric amount (1:1) and with an excess of reducing reagent in the composition (1:2) and thermal treatment in several temperature ranges, 1100 and 1200 & DEG;C, was performed.
Titulo: Perovskites used as cathode in solid oxide fuel cells synthesized by solution combustion synthesis (SCS)

Sentencas: As a result, the samples calcined at 1200 & DEG;C showed the best structural characteristics concerning the other temperatures used, with an average crystallite size of 37 nm for the 1:1 sample and 42 nm for the 1:2 sample.
Titulo: Perovskites used as cathode in solid oxide fuel cells synthesized by solution combustion synthesis (SCS)

Sentencas: The conductivity of the materials tends to increase with increasing temperature and excess of fuel.
Titulo: Perovskites used as cathode in solid oxide fuel cells synthesized by solution combustion synthesis (SCS)

Sentencas: At 500 & DEG;C, in the 1:1 sample, 2.61 x 10(-4) S/cm was obtained and in the 1:2 sample, 11.4 x 10(-4) S/cm.
Titulo: Perovskites used as cathode in solid oxide fuel cells synthesized by solution combustion synthesis (SCS)

Sentencas: Given the findings obtained in this work report, the fuel excess increases crystallite size and conductivity and reduces band gap and activation energy, emphasizing a considerable influence of the content of fuel used in SCS in the evaluated properties.
Titulo: Perovskites used as cathode in solid oxide fuel cells synthesized by solution combustion synthesis (SCS)
